participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, Emily enjoys simple pleasures but occasionally craves social interaction.
participant_1.background: I am content with my simple life, but I do miss the occasional social interaction. I like to go to the farmers market every weekend. I want to show off my new earrings to my friends. I'm afraid my car will break down while I'm out fishing. My favorite food is sushi.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Friendly and lighthearted, Jason values family and enjoys leisure activities that bring joy.
participant_2.background: I have a soft spot for my parents and sweets. I love watching sitcoms on television. I like to play soccer, draw and read Asterix. My favorite websites are those that help me with my addiction recovery and those that offer suspense novels. No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.

content.text: I'm pretty excited for the weekend.  I'm going to the farmers market to get fresh produce and then I'm going to make sushi.
That sounds nice!  I like going to the farmers market too.  I usually buy some fresh fruit to snack on.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch sitcoms and play soccer.  I also like to draw and read Asterix.
Cool!  I like to watch sitcoms too.  I'm not very athletic, so I don't play sports.  I like to draw and read as well.
I like The Office, Parks and Rec, and Seinfeld.  What are yours?
I like The Office, Friends, and Seinfeld too!  I also like The Big Bang Theory.
Those are all great shows!  I've never seen The Big Bang Theory.  Is it good?
I think it's really funny.  It's about a group of scientists who are all very smart, but they're also a little socially awkward.
That sounds like something I would like.  I'll have to check it out.
You should!  I think you'll like it.
